Dear all,
=A0
I've again completed a reading of Taiheiki, and while I find =
it a truly exhilerating read, one cannot help but question certain elements=
.
=A0
Certainly the basic events in the tale are grounded in history (the K=
amakura regime, the characters, the chastisement of Go-Daigo, etc). While t=
his foundation in fact extends to certain clashes (notably Akasaka and Chih=
aya), but were the other 'battles' in the tale actual occurrences (such as =
Funanoe in chapter7) or embellishments??
=A0
Thankyou
MLorimer
